headline: AI Disruption Fears Roil Software Industry, and the Stock Market
summary: From Legalzoom.com and Expedia to Ares and Apollo, shares of companies that sell or invest in software fell sharply on Tuesday.

raw.headline: AI Disruption Fears Roil Software Industry, and the Stock Market

headline: "2026 shoule be the year of the IPO," says Blackstone’s Gray
summary: Investing.com -- Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray expects dealmaking and initial public offerings to gain momentum in 2026, driven by a favorable regulatory environment and lower interest rates.

raw.headline: "2026 shoule be the year of the IPO," says Blackstone’s Gray
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray expects dealmaking and initial public offerings to gain momentum in 2026, driven by a favorable regulatory environment and lower interest rates.

headline: Jon Gray on Investing in AI During Rapid Change
summary: The Blackstone president tells WSJ Invest Live how his company is navigating investing in artificial intelligence during this transformative time.

raw.headline: Jon Gray on Investing in AI During Rapid Change

headline: Blackstone’s Jon Gray Sees Disruption Risk in Private Credit
summary: Jon Gray, Blackstone’s president and chief operating officer, said at WSJ Invest Live that the private credit industry is healthy despite issues with a handful of specific investments in recent months.

raw.headline: Blackstone’s Jon Gray Sees Disruption Risk in Private Credit
raw.summary: Jon Gray, Blackstone’s president and chief operating officer, said at WSJ Invest Live that the private credit industry is healthy despite issues with a handful of specific investments in recent months.

headline: Blackstone's Jon Gray Sees U.S. Economy as 'Battleship' After Turbulent Year
summary: At WSJ Invest Live, the asset manager's CEO shares optimism for IPOs and M&A in 2026, as well as the health of the private credit market, and discusses Blackstone’s investment strategy in AI infrastructure.

raw.headline: Blackstone's Jon Gray Sees U.S. Economy as 'Battleship' After Turbulent Year

headline: Blackstone (BX) Reports Strong Q4 Earnings, Citizens Maintains Market Outperform Rating
summary: Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) ranks among the biggest publicly traded asset managers. On January 30, Goldman Sachs reduced its price target for Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) to $158 from $166 while keeping a Neutral rating on the asset manager. The revision came as Goldman Sachs forecasted a 12% compound annual growth rate in Blackstone’s core management fees […]
